transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Haan ji Manu ji baat kar rahe hain Manu Sharma?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur namaskar Manoj ji, Aakash baat kar raha hun India Mart se senior manager. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Mere yahan batao.
Executive: Aur discussion hua hoga aapka hamari team se aapne not satisfied mark kiya tha. To main wohi puch raha tha kya problem aa raha hai service mein kuch problem aa raha hai kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Sir aise customer hi nahi mile mere ko is baar.
Executive: Aur customer nahi mile?
Customer: Haan. Inquiry mein jyada jo aapne marble haan jo cheez chahiye thi woh cheez requirement aayi nahi meri.
Executive: Nahi is baar sir aapne buylead bahut kam use kari last year aap buylead acche se use kar rahe the is baar agar aap dekhoge na to buylead bahut kam consume hui hai sir. To aap hi handle karte the ya koi staff wagera tha sir?
Customer: Main hi karta tha.
Executive: Aap hi karte the to woh matlab buylead kam consume kyun hui iska koi reason tha koi problem thi?
Customer: Consume karta tha jo bhi marble ki nahi aati thi.
Executive: Aap agar dekhoge na sir marble ki bahut sari buylead aayi hai aap online aao main aapko dikhata hun ki kitni marble ki buylead generate hui hai sir hamare paas.
Customer: Bahut sari buyleads aayi hai sir bahut sari inquiry bhi aayi hai sir call bhi aaye hain aapke paas call thode se kam aaye hain but inquiry
Customer: Call kahan aaye hain call kahin aaye hi nahi.
Executive: Call ek do ek do call aaye hain sir but inquiry aur buylead to bahut sari aayi hai sir aapke paas.
Executive: Thodi si aap aapka dealing kis area mein rehta hai?
Customer: All India mein rehta hai.
Executive: Pan India level pe karte ho na aap aapke paas woh hai laptop hai abhi?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aapko maine ek link bheja hai ek baar ek baar aap join karo.
Executive: Main aapko dikha deta hun ki aapki product line ki kitni buylead aayi hai.
Customer: Kal kal kar lunga main abhi shop pe nahi hun.
Executive: Kal kitne baje rahoge?
Customer: Kal 11 baje.
Executive: 11 baje. Kal 11 baje aap ek baar discuss kar lo jo bhi problem hai usko sort out karenge. Theek hai ek baar dekh lena ki kitni pure saal mein buylead aapki product line ki aayi hai kaun kaun si miss hui hai sir kaun si consume kari hai sara kuch aap hame feedback bhi de dena sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kal 11 baje ka final kar lete hain theek hai?
Customer: Haan theek hai. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive enough customers.

- Requirement of marble not fulfilled.



Resolution:

- Executive said customer used less buyleads.

- Executive offered to show buylead generation online.

- Agreed to discuss the issue next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive and customer will connect next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer issue, discussion
